member.summary:
! matrix, calculates the inverse of the matrix
optimized 4x4 matrix inversion using cramer's rule, found in the game engine http://www.ogre3d.org takes about 1,8ns to execute on intel core2 duo 2Ghz, the intel reference implementation (not assembly optimized) was about 2,2ns. http://www.intel.com/design/pentiumiii/sml/24504301.pdf
member.returns: Inverse matrix

member.summary:

code is:
x = v1.y * v2.z - v1.z * v2.y y = v1.z * v2.x - v1.x * v2.y z = v1.x * v2.y - v1.y * v2.x
member.returns: New vector which is orthogonal to v1 and v2

member.name: M:VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D.op_BitwiseAnd(VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D,VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D)
member.summary:
4d-vector & 4d-vector, performs a quaternion multiplication
defined as: w = v1.w * v2.w - (v1.xyz | v2.xyz) xyz = v1.xyz * v2.w + v2.xyz * v1.w + (v1.xyz & v2.xyz)
code is:
x = v1.w*v2.x + v1.x*v2.w + v1.y*v2.z - v1.z*v2.y y = v1.w*v2.y + v1.y*v2.w + v1.z*v2.x - v1.x*v2.z z = v1.w*v2.z + v1.z*v2.w + v1.x*v2.y - v1.y*v2.x w = v1.w*v2.w - v1.x*v2.x - v1.y*v2.y - v1.z*v2.z
member.returns: Quaternion v1 multiplied by quaternion v2

member.name: M:VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D.op_BitwiseOr(VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D,VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D)
member.summary: vector | vector, dot product for vectors, that is the sum of all component wise products
member.returns: Dot product of v1 and v2

member.name: M:VVVV.Utils.VMath.VMath.Inverse(VVVV.Utils.VMath.Matrix4x4)
member.summary:
Optimized 4x4 matrix inversion using cramer's rule, found in the game engine http://www.ogre3d.org Note that the unary ! operator of Matrix4x4 does the same
Code takes about 1,8ns to execute on intel core2 duo 2Ghz, the intel reference implementation (not assembly optimized) was about 2,2ns. http://www.intel.com/design/pentiumiii/sml/24504301.pdf
member.returns: Inverse matrix of input matrix A

member.name: M:VVVV.Utils.VMath.VMath.Det(VVVV.Utils.VMath.Matrix4x4)
member.summary: Calculates the determinat of a 4x4 matrix Note that the unary ~ operator of Matrix4x4 does the same
member.returns: Determinat of input matrix A

member.name: M:VVVV.Utils.VMath.VMath.BilerpMatrix(VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D,VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D,VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D,VVVV.Utils.VMath.Vector4D)
member.summary:
Builds a matrix that interpolates 4d-vectors like a 2d bilinear interpolation in x and y direction
Should be used to transform 4d vectors with interpolation foacors in the 4d-form (x, y, x*y, 1)
member.returns: Linear interpolation matrix, can be used to interpolate 4d vectors with interpolation factors in the 4d-form (x, y, x*y, 1)
